summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4548 for the improvement of the alley in block 5, University Heights Addition, being the alley between University Way and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53193, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
